page.title: 19THE A.59 MAIN ROAD
page.content: The whole life of the village of Green Hammerton is dominated and cut in two by the dangerous A59 trunk road. Heavy lorries roar through the village shaking the old farmhouses close to the road and making it impossible for children to come to school or play freely without supervision. Plans have been approved by the County Council to build a By-Pass to the West of the village taking the Borobridge and A.l traffic away from the village. In the last week, however, we have heard that these plans have once again been shelved for another two to three years.There is to be a meeting of the Planning Committee of the County Council at Northallerton on 6th December to which it is hoped a protest against the delay will be presented.
